nginx.description: Open source reverse proxy server for HTTP, HTTPS, SMTP, POP3, and IMAP protocols, as well as a load balancer, HTTP cache, and a web server.
nginx.more_info:
You must create a default config file in the Config Storage share before starting this Rockon, which you can extend with your own custom configuration.
For advanced users, an example configuration file can be found in the nginx wiki. The config volume is mounted at 
/etc/nginx/conf.d/

/etc/nginx/conf.d.description:
Choose a Share for the nginx configuration. Eg: create a Share called nginx-config for this purpose alone.
You must add a default config file.
/etc/nginx/conf.d.label: Config Storage

/usr/share/nginx/html.description: Choose a Share for the files that nginx will serve (HTML, JavaScript, etc.). Eg: create a share called nginx-data for this purpose alone.
/usr/share/nginx/html.label: Served Content Storage
